name: Healthcare-Patient-Risk Analytical App for Developers
description: The app helps healthcare providers optimize patient care by predicting patient risk levels.

appStages.name: Introduction
Exploring-Patient-Data
ML-Model-Training
Model-Validation
Validation-Analysis
appStages.stageDetails:
{
  "components": [
    {
      "label": "HTML",
      "attrs": [
        {
          "attr": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv class\u003d\"introduction\"\u003e\r\n  \u003cdiv class\u003d\"header\"\u003e\r\n    \u003ch3\u003ePatient-Risk Validation Analysis\u003c/h3\u003e\r\n  \u003c/div\u003e\r\n\r\n  \u003csection\u003e\r\n    \u003ch4\u003e\u003c/h4\u003e\r\n    \u003cul\u003e\r\n      \r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003ePick a model to explore actual vs validation performance metrics.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n      \r\n    \u003c/ul\u003e\r\n  \u003c/section\u003e\r\n\r\n \r\n\r\n \r\n\u003c/div\u003e",
      "refreshOnChange": false,
      "key": "html1",
      "type": "htmlelement",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "Model Algorithm",
      "optionsLabelPosition": "right",
      "description": "Select the algorithm with which the model was trained",
      "customClass": "m-3 p-1",
      "inline": true,
      "tableView": false,
      "defaultValue": "rfc",
      "values": [
        {
          "label": "Random Forest Classifier",
          "value": "rfc",
          "shortcut": ""
        },
        {
          "label": "Decision Tree Classifier",
          "value": "dtc",
          "shortcut": ""
        }
      ],
      "key": "selectModel_va",
      "type": "radio",
      "input": true
    },
    {
      "label": "Columns",
      "columns": [
        {
          "components": [],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        },
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Get Validation Analysis",
              "action": "event",
              "showValidations": false,
              "theme": "info",
              "customClass": "float-right btn- mt-3 mb-2 rounded",
              "tableView": false,
              "key": "run",
              "properties": {
                "wfId": "c883514b-87e6-48b8-967c-f1aa149414a4"
              },
              "conditional": {
                "show": true,
                "when": "selectModel_va",
                "eq": "rfc"
              },
              "type": "button",
              "event": "execute",
              "input": true
            },
            {
              "label": "Get Validation Analysis",
              "action": "event",
              "showValidations": false,
              "theme": "info",
              "customClass": "float-right btn- mt-3 mb-2 rounded",
              "tableView": false,
              "key": "run1",
              "properties": {
                "wfId": "e0823c5f-12ee-4aca-8394-448db52ecb15"
              },
              "conditional": {
                "show": true,
                "when": "selectModel_va",
                "eq": "dtc"
              },
              "type": "button",
              "event": "execute",
              "input": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        }
      ],
      "customClass": "m-2",
      "key": "columns2",
      "type": "columns",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
